This site offers unique insights into dinosaur behaviour and their interaction with aquatic environments.

description: China is transforming its cargo ship, Zhongda 79, into an arsenal ship, equipping it with containerized launchers for up to 60 missiles. This upgrade, featuring advanced weaponry including hypersonic missiles, signifies Beijing's push to bolster its naval capabilities and match the US Navy's vertical launch systems. The vessel's transformation highlights China's growing maritime ambitions.

description: The Supreme Court has intervened in the Unnao rape case. It has halted the Delhi high court's decision to suspend former BJP leader Kuldeep Singh Sengar's life sentence. The apex court is examining if an MLA qualifies as a public servant under the POCSO Act. This move ensures Sengar remains in jail. The survivor welcomes the Supreme Court's action.

title: MLB trade rumors: Mets eye $10M Phillies star; Brandon Nimmo in focus
description: The New York Mets are reportedly signing veteran outfielder Max Kepler to a one-year deal, aiming for a cost-effective solution after trading Brandon Nimmo. Kepler offers defensive reliability and left-handed power, fitting the Mets' strategy of maintaining roster stability and payroll flexibility while preparing for top prospect Carson Benge's eventual rise.

title: Tim Dillon questions Erika Kirk’s public appearances after Charlie Kirk tragedy
description: Tim Dillon questioned Erika Kirk’s public appearances after reports about Charlie Kirk, saying people feel confused. On his podcast, he discussed her merch events and her interview with Nicki Minaj at America Fest. Erika Kirk defended her actions, continued leading Turning Point USA, and reassured Minaj during their on-stage conversation.

title: Chinese billionaire’s plan: Gaming tycoon fathered 100 children
description: Chinese billionaire Xu Bo reportedly aims to father at least 20 US-born children via surrogacy to inherit his $1.1 billion gaming fortune. While his company denies claims of over 100 children, they confirmed 12 were born in the US. This trend echoes similar desires from figures like Pavel Durov and Elon Musk to expand their legacies.

title: ‘AI agents are becoming a problem’: OpenAI CEO flags risks; offers $555K role
description: OpenAI is hiring a high-paid Head of Preparedness amid growing fears of AI systems exploiting security flaws and harming mental well-being. CEO Sam Altman acknowledged models are finding critical vulnerabilities, while also highlighting AI's potential psychological impact. The role will tackle cybersecurity, biosecurity, and self-improving AI risks, a crucial step as AI's dual nature becomes apparent.

title: Travis Kelce admits he let Andy Reid down amid Chiefs’ tough season
description: Kansas City Chiefs fans experienced an unfamiliar season of losses and missed playoffs in 2025, a stark contrast to years of dominance.  Veteran Travis Kelce expressed deep disappointment, feeling he let down coach Andy Reid, highlighting their strong bond and his unwavering sense of responsibility to the team and his mentor.

title: Who is Nick Shirley? YouTuber behind viral Minnesota daycare fraud probe
description: Nick Shirley is a YouTuber whose video alleging daycare fraud in Minnesota went viral on December 26. He claims some centers received millions despite appearing inactive. His video drew attention from Congressman Tom Emmer, who questioned Governor Tim Walz. All claims against YouTuber remain allegations, with no official response yet.
